header_text: Recently, you've noticed that you are having intrusive thoughts. These thoughts are disturbing to you, and you cannot believe that you are thinking such horrible things. You think that you are going crazy.

elements.text: After a while, you realize that they are just thoughts, and that they don't mean anything about you as a person. You think that you are not going crazy, and that you are a good...
